arcana.name: Laborer
arcana.description: Dockworkers, miners, and other tradesworkers are the heart of the station. They're not well armed, but they're tough, brave, and often carrying some kind of heavy equipment that can be used as a weapon in a pinch.
arcana.intents: * Sword: Move 1 towards the nearest player, 8 damage melee attack. * Wand: Move 1 towards the nearest player, 4 damage melee attack, +1 for every Laborer in the same Zone. * Cup: Provide 2 shields to all Laborers in the same Zone. * Pentacle: Catch breath. Heal 1 HP. * Major Arcana:
